sqlMap.select:
select c.*, chec.ym cym from qkj_r_score c join qkj_r_check chec on (chec.uuid=c.check_ym)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.check_ym=#check_ym# chec.ym like #cym# +'%' c.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode#
c.acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode2# and ISNULL(c.acheck_user, '0')='0'
ISNULL(c.acheck_user, '0')='0' c.acheck_user=#acheck_user#
EXISTS( select 1 from qkj_r_sonscore ss where ss.score_id=c.uuid and ss.typea=#typea# and ss.check_user=#check_userh# )

select u.USER_NAME acheck_username,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname,p.POSITION_NAME position_name,s.uuid,s.acheck_user,s.acheck_usercode,s.check_score,s.check_date,s.lm_user,s.lm_time, s.check_ym,s.remark,s.bscore,s.hremark,s.jltype from qkj_r_score s left join s_sys_user u on (s.acheck_user=u.UUID) left join s_cfg_position p on (u.[POSITION]=p.uuid) left JOIN s_sys_department d on (s.acheck_usercode=d.dept_code)

select distinct u.uuid u_id,u.DEPT_CODE u_code,u.USER_NAME acheck_username,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname,df.dept_cname df_name from s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d on (u.dept_code=d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department df on (df.dept_code=d.parent_dept) join ( select newp.* from ( select p.uuid from s_cfg_position p where EXISTS (select DISTINCT fid.position_id from qkj_t_indexdetail fid where fid.position_id=p.uuid and ISNULL(fid.position_id,'0')<>'0') ) newp) a on u.[POSITION]=a.uuid
LEFT JOIN qkj_t_indexdetail id on (a.uuid=id.position_id) left join s_cfg_position pp on(pp.uuid=u.[POSITION])
where pp.POSITION_GRADE<>4 and not exists (select * from qkj_r_score s left JOIN qkj_r_sonscore sd on(sd.score_id=s.uuid) left join qkj_r_check k on(s.check_ym=k.uuid) where s.acheck_user=u.uuid
k.uuid=#check_ym# sd.typea=#typea# sd.check_user=#check_user# )
u.parent_user=#parent_user# and ISNULL(pp.uuid, '0')<>'0'
id.check_deptcode = #check_deptcode# id.check_post = #check_post# and id.type=1

select distinct u.uuid u_id,u.DEPT_CODE u_code,u.USER_NAME acheck_username,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname,df.dept_cname df_name from s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d on (u.dept_code=d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department df on (df.dept_code=d.parent_dept) left join ( select newp.* from ( select p.uuid from s_cfg_position p where EXISTS (select DISTINCT fid.position_id from qkj_t_indexdetail fid where fid.position_id=p.uuid and ISNULL(fid.position_id,'0')<>'0' ) ) newp) a on u.[POSITION]=a.uuid
LEFT JOIN qkj_t_indexdetail id on (a.uuid=id.position_id) left join s_cfg_position pp on(pp.uuid=u.[POSITION])
where pp.POSITION_GRADE<>4 and not exists (select * from qkj_r_score s left JOIN qkj_r_sonscore sd on(sd.score_id=s.uuid) left join qkj_r_check k on(s.check_ym=k.uuid) where s.acheck_user=u.uuid
k.uuid=#check_ym# sd.typea=#typea# sd.check_user=#check_user# )
u.parent_user=#parent_user# and ISNULL(pp.uuid, '0')<>'0'
id.check_deptcode = #check_deptcode# id.check_post = #check_post# and id.type=1

select distinct d.DEPT_CODE d_code,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname,d.parent_dept parent_dept,pd.dept_cname df_name from ( select d.dept_code,d.dept_cname,d.parent_dept from s_sys_department d where EXISTS (select 1 from qkj_t_indexdetail fid where ISNULL(fid.dept_code,'0')<>'0'
) )d left JOIN s_sys_department pd on (d.parent_dept=pd.dept_code)
LEFT JOIN qkj_t_indexdetail id on (d.dept_code=id.dept_code) where not exists (select * from qkj_r_score s left JOIN qkj_r_sonscore sd on(sd.score_id=s.uuid) left join qkj_r_check k on(s.check_ym=k.uuid) where s.acheck_usercode=d.dept_code and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')='0'
k.uuid=#check_ym# sd.typea=#typea# sd.check_user=#check_user# ) EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkj_t_indexdetail a where a.dept_code=d.dept_code)
d.parent_dept In #parent_dept[]#
d.dept_code In #chdept[]#
d.dept_code In #chdept[]#
id.check_deptcode = #check_deptcode# id.check_post = #check_post# and id.type=1

select distinct d.DEPT_CODE d_code,d.dept_cname acheck_deptname,d.parent_dept parent_dept,pd.dept_cname df_name from ( select d.dept_code,d.dept_cname,d.parent_dept from s_sys_department d where EXISTS (select 1 from qkj_t_indexdetail fid where fid.dept_code=d.dept_code) ) d left JOIN s_sys_department pd on (d.parent_dept=pd.dept_code)
LEFT JOIN qkj_t_indexdetail id on (d.dept_code=id.dept_code) where not exists (select * from qkj_r_score s left JOIN qkj_r_sonscore sd on(sd.score_id=s.uuid) left join qkj_r_check k on(s.check_ym=k.uuid) where s.acheck_usercode=d.dept_code and ISNULL(s.acheck_user, '0')='0'
k.uuid=#check_ym# sd.typea=#typea# sd.check_user=#check_user# ) EXISTS (SELECT 1 from qkj_t_indexdetail a where a.dept_code=d.dept_code)
d.parent_dept In #parent_dept[]#
d.dept_code In #chdept[]#
d.dept_code In #chdept[]#
id.check_deptcode = #check_deptcode# id.check_post = #check_post# and id.type=1

select sum(ss.check_goal) ss_goal from qkj_r_sonscore ss left join qkj_r_score s on (ss.score_id=s.uuid)
s.uuid=#uuid# ss.typea=#typea# ss.check_user=#check_user#
sqlMap.update: Update qkj_r_score Set check_ym=#check_ym#, acheck_user=#acheck_user#, acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode#, lm_time=#lm_time#, remark=#remark#, hremark=#hremark#, bscore=#bscore#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update qkj_r_score Set lm_time=#lm_time#, remark=#remark#, bscore=#bscore#, lm_user=#lm_user# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update qkj_r_score Set check_score=#check_score# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update qkj_r_score Set finish=2 Where uuid=#uuid#
Update qkj_r_score Set ay_totelScore=#ay_totelScore# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update qkj_r_score Set check_score=ISNULL(bscore,0)+(select SUM(check_goal) from qkj_r_sonscore where score_id=#value# ) Where uuid=#value#
Update qkj_r_score Set check_score=#check_score# Where jltype=4 and check_ym=#check_ym# and acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# and ISNULL(acheck_user, '0')<>'0'
sqlMap.delete:
Delete From qkj_r_score
Where uuid In #uuid[]#
sqlMap.select:
select SUM(s.check_score) tscore,s.acheck_usercode from qkj_r_score s where s.acheck_usercode in (select id.position_dept from qkj_t_indexdetail id where id.type=2 and id.position_id=#position_id#) and acheck_usercode=#acheck_usercode# and check_ym like #check_yms# +'%' and s.uuid <>#uuid#
GROUP BY s.acheck_usercode

select c.*,d.isdept isdept,d.uuid kpi_id,d.kpi kpi,d.weight weight,d.cyc cyc,d.definition definition,d.correctly correctly,d.type dtype from qkj_r_sonscore c left join qkj_r_score s on(c.score_id=s.uuid) LEFT JOIN qkj_t_indexdetail d on(d.uuid=c.check_index) left join qkj_r_check ch on (ch.uuid=s.check_ym)
c.uuid=#uuid# c.score_id=#score_id# c.check_index=#check_index# ch.uuid=#check_ym# d.kpi=#kpiid# d.uuid=#kid# d.check_deptcode=#check_deptcode# d.check_post=#check_post# c.check_user=#check_user# ch.state=0 $sql$

Select s.* From qkj_r_sonscore s left join qkj_r_score ss on (s.score_id=ss.uuid) left join qkj_t_indexdetail i on (s.check_index=i.uuid)
s.check_index=#kpiid# ss.check_ym=#check_ym# ss.acheck_usercode=#dept_code# and isnull(ss.acheck_user,'0')='0' and ISNULL(ss.acheck_usercode, '0')<>'0' (ss.acheck_usercode=(select ds.parent_dept from s_sys_department ds where ds.dept_code=#par_dept#) or ss.acheck_usercode=#par_dept# ) and isnull(ss.acheck_user,'0')='0' and ISNULL(ss.acheck_usercode, '0')<>'0' ss.acheck_usercode in (select ud.dept_code from s_sys_userdept ud where ud.user_id=#userid#) and isnull(ss.acheck_user,'0')='0' and ISNULL(ss.acheck_usercode, '0')<>'0' i.kpi=#kpi#

Select ss.* From qkj_r_score ss
ss.check_ym=#check_ym# ss.acheck_usercode in (select ud.dept_code from s_sys_userdept ud where ud.user_id=#userid#) and isnull(ss.acheck_user,'0')='0' and ISNULL(ss.acheck_usercode, '0')<>'0'
sqlMap.update:
Update qkj_r_sonscore Set check_score=#check_score#, check_goal=#check_goal#
Where uuid=#uuid#
